info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 7:57PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Winter precipitation reported across parts of Southeast New Mexico and the Permian Basin... Light snow, sleet, mixed with some rain has been reported from Lea County New Mexico eastward to Scurry County and as far south as the Midland/Odessa. New Mexico DOT reports some difficult driving conditions in the Tatum area with snow and some ice on roads. Elsewhere accumulations will be lighter, still a few slick spots may develop across the mentioned areas. All precipitation types are expected to end by 1 AM CST. Use caution if driving on this very cold night.
